welcome.name: Welcome
welcome.content:
An example using the default settings provided by the library!

@ayanobot/rankcard

npm i @ayanobot/rankcard

Ayano's own Rank Card generator! (: View the documentation [here](https://ayano.newtt.me/#/docs/rankcard/main/general/welcome) The default font is currently Neutra Text Bold - [Discord.js](https://discord.js.org) design font. ### To-do - [ ] Eris Support - [ ] More helper methods - [ ] More customisation

classes.name: RankCard
classes.description: A rank card, as used by Ayano!

params.name: input
params.description: The data for the rank card to initialise with

props.name: _data
props.description: Rank card data

params.name: fonts
params.description: The fonts to build the card with

methods.name: _calculateProgress
methods.description: Calculates the progress the progress bar should be at

methods.name: toggleDisplay
methods.description: Toggles the display of a piece of data!

methods.name: setProgress
methods.description: Edits data about the card's progress piece.

params.name: fontColour
params.description: The colour to make the progress font

params.name: fontSize
params.description: The size to make the progress font

methods.name: setProgressBar
methods.description: Edits data about the card's progress bar piece.

params.name: colour
params.description: The colour to make the progress bar

params.name: trackColour
params.description: The colour to make the progress bar's track

params.name: rounded
params.description: Whether the progress bar should be rounded or not

methods.name: setStatus
methods.description: Edits data about the card's status piece.

params.name: circle
params.description: Whether the status should be rendered as a circle

methods.name: setOverlay
methods.description: Edits data about the card's overlay piece.

params.name: colour
params.description: The colour the overlay should be

methods.name: setLevel
methods.description: Edits data about the card's level piece.

params.name: fontColour
params.description: The colour the level's font should be

params.name: fontSize
params.description: The size the level's font should be

methods.name: setRank
methods.description: Edits data about the card's rank piece.

params.name: fontColour
params.description: The colour the rank's font should be

params.name: fontSize
params.description: The size the rank's font should be

methods.name: setTag
methods.description: Edits data about the card's tag piece.

params.name: fontColour
params.description: The colour the tag's font should be

params.name: fontSize
params.description: The size the tag's font should be

typedefs.name: BuildFonts
typedefs.description: Fonts provided when building to customise rank cards.

props.name: bold
props.description: The font to use for bold text

props.name: regular
props.description: The font to use for regular text

typedefs.name: Font
typedefs.description: A font to register with Canvas for usage during building.

props.name: path
props.description: The path to the font file

props.name: family
props.description: The name of the font family to register it under

props.name: weight
props.description: The weight of the font

props.name: style
props.description: The style of the font

typedefs.name: XPForLevel
typedefs.description: Calculates the amount of XP for a level.

params.name: level
params.description: The level to calculate the amount of XP for

returns.description: The amount of XP required for the provided level

typedefs.name: InputData
typedefs.description: Input to generate the Rank Card with.

props.name: level
props.description: The level of the user the rank card is being generated for

props.name: xpForLevel
props.description: A function that calculates the amount of XP per level

props.name: user
props.description: The user to generate the rank card for

props.name: rank
props.description: The rank of the user

props.name: fonts
props.description: The fonts to register for usage during building

props.name: usernameLength
props.description: The length to shorten the username to

props.name: stripAccents
props.description: Whether accents should be stripped from the username or not

typedefs.name: Pieces
typedefs.description: Pieces exposed by the library. This can be:* 'progress'* 'avatar'* 'status'* 'overlay'* 'level'* 'rank'* 'tag'

typedefs.name: Piece
typedefs.description: Internal type to represent a piece of data.

props.name: value
props.description: The piece of data

props.name: fontColour
props.description: The colour to render the data with

props.name: fontSize
props.description: The font size in pixels to render the data at

props.name: display
props.description: Whether the piece should be displayed or not

typedefs.name: BackgroundType
typedefs.description: Supported background input types. This can be:* 'image'* 'colour'

props.name: type
props.description: The type of the input. Can be one of 'image' or 'colour'

props.name: value
props.description: The inputted value. If 'image', Buffer. If 'colour', string.

typedefs.name: ProgressType
typedefs.description: Supported progress bar colour input types. This can be:* 'gradient'* 'colour'

props.name: display
props.description: Whether any progress related data should be displayed

props.name: currentXP
props.description: The current amount of XP the user has

props.name: requiredXP
props.description: The amount of XP required for the next level

props.name: fontSize
props.description: The size of the font for the data

props.name: fontColour
props.description: The colour for the progress font

props.name: x
props.description: The x coordinate

props.name: y
props.description: The y coordinate

props.name: height
props.description: The height in pixels

props.name: width
props.description: The width in pixels

props.name: bar
props.description: Progress bar data

props.name: bar.rounded
props.description: Whether or not the progress bar is rounded

props.name: bar.trackColour
props.description: The colour of the bar's track

props.name: bar.radius
props.description: The radius to use if the bar is rounded

props.name: bar.colour.type
props.description: The type of the input. Can be one of 'colour' or 'gradient'.

props.name: bar.colour.value
props.description: The value of the input. If 'colour', string. If 'gradient', string[].

props.name: display
props.description: Whether the status should be displayed

props.name: width
props.description: The width of the line

props.name: type
props.description: The status of the user

props.name: colour
props.description: The colour of the status

props.name: circle
props.description: Whether the status should display in a small circle rather than a ring

props.name: display
props.description: Whether the overlay should be displayed

props.name: opacity
props.description: The alpha/opacity value of the overlay

props.name: colour
props.description: The colour of the overlay

props.name: value
props.description: The value of the avatar

props.name: display
props.description: Whether the avatar should be displayed or not

props.name: x
props.description: The x coordinate

props.name: y
props.description: The y coordinate

props.name: height
props.description: The height in pixels

props.name: width
props.description: The width in pixels

props.name: radius
props.description: The radius to use

props.name: display
props.description: Whether the tag should be displayed

props.name: fontSize
props.description: The size of the font for the data

props.name: fontColour
props.description: The colour for the prog

props.name: username
props.description: The user's username

props.name: discriminator
props.description: The user's discriminator

typedefs.name: CardData
typedefs.description: Internal data used by the builder to render cards.

props.name: width
props.description: The width of the card

props.name: height
props.description: The height of the card

props.name: background
props.description: Data about the background of the card

props.name: progress
props.description: Data about the progress through the level

props.name: status
props.description: Data about the status

props.name: overlay
props.description: Data about the overlay

props.name: rank
props.description: Data about the user's rank

props.name: level
props.description: Data about the user's level

props.name: avatar
props.description: Data about the user's avatar

props.name: tag
props.description: Data about the user's tag
